Text:
You're more than welcome. Feels nice to give something back to people who share my interests.

Bear in mind this is my first-ever torrent, and it took an hours' worth of mucking around to get it created/published/seeded. If it just plain doesn't download, lemme know. If it does -- seed that sucker! And support the artists by buying some CD's!

This torrent didn't take for some reason -- apparently there are some issues with BitTorrent 5.0+ in this. The second torrent I've created works fine. Go here:

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3591204/Music_of_the_Ancient_World
thanks, love rare/special uploads like this.... *thumbs up*

Thanks again (bows). 

So this link *does* work okay? even though all the seeders show up on the other...? Okay. Whatever works.  :D

If you enjoyed this one, I've created another musical torrent spanning the Golden Age of Piracy at:

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3591364
